Common questions about our fiber laser c: Common questions about our fiber laser cutting machines
Single table laser cutting machines have: Single table laser cutting machines have one fixed working table, offering a more economical solution suitable for low to medium production volumes. Dual table machines feature two exchangeable tables that allow for continuous operation - while one table is cutting, the other can be loaded/unloaded, significantly increasing productivity by reducing idle time.
Our fiber laser cutting machines can cut: Our fiber laser cutting machines can cut various thicknesses of carbon steel, stainless steel, aluminum, and 12mm, and copper/brass up to 8mm (thicknesses vary based on laser power). Higher wattage lasers can cut thicker materials. The machines handle various metals including mild steel, stainless steel, galvanized steel, aluminum alloys, copper, brass, and titanium.
Fiber lasers are nearly maintenance-free: Fiber lasers are nearly maintenance-free compared to CO2 lasers. Regular maintenance includes: cleaning protective lenses weekly, checking water chiller levels, inspecting gas pressure, and cleaning dust extraction filters. The fiber laser source itself requires no maintenance and has a lifespan of 100,000+ hours. No laser gas refills or mirror alignments are needed.
Yes, we provide comprehensive support in: Yes, we provide comprehensive support including on-site installation, machine commissioning, and operator training (typically 3-5 days). Training covers machine operation, CNC programming, parameter optimization, basic maintenance, and troubleshooting. Complete operation manuals and video tutorials are also provided.
Operating costs include electricity (fib: Operating costs include electricity (fiber lasers are highly efficient with ~30% electro-optical conversion), assist gas (nitrogen, oxygen, or compressed air), water chiller electricity, and occasional consumables (protective lenses, nozzles). Fiber lasers are more cost-effective than CO2 lasers due to lower power consumption and minimal maintenance requirements.
Standard configuration machines typicall: Standard configuration machines typically ship within 30-45 days after order confirmation. Custom specifications or higher power configurations may require 45-60 days. We provide regular production updates and coordinate logistics to ensure smooth delivery and installation.
Get detailed technical specifications, d: Get detailed technical specifications, dimensions, and performance data for our fiber laser cutting machines. Download our comprehensive product brochure in PDF format.
